Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Homan/Grand
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Division, Pulaski, Chicago and Homan due to police activity near Homan/Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Division, Pulaski, Chicago, then resume their normal route on Homan due to police activity near Homan/Grand.

Allow extra travel time.
